answerText: collagen[10] Collagen is a key component of this general structure, which includes the basement membrane. This structure, which contains fibronectins, integrins, and elastins, holds cells together in tissues.
heading: NASAT |2014 | 1 | 1 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: mutation in one isoform of this protein causes a condition in which the sclera of the eyes turn blue and bones are easily broken. [10] Name this triple helical protein that is abundant in connective tissue. Vitamin C is required for the enzymes that hydroxylate its proline and lysine residues.
